sentence.Network_en: The department has been shrinking year by year because of budget cuts.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个部门因为预算削减而逐年萎缩。

sentence.Network_en: Hungary may have to lower its hopes of shrinking its state sector.
sentence.Network_cn: 匈牙利可能不得不降低其缩小国家军事管制区的期望。

sentence.Network_en: When it comes to expressing himself he is no shrinking violet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在表达自己的想法时毫不羞怯。

冶金专业英语词汇(S) ... shrink 收缩 shrink hole 缩孔 shrink rule 收缩尺.

entry.tran: (通常指布料、衣服等洗后)缩水，收缩，缩小，皱缩
entry.def: If cloth or clothing shrinks, it becomes smaller in size, usually as a result of being washed.

example.tran: 我所有的套头毛衣都缩水了。

entry.def: If something shrinks or something else shrinks it, it becomes smaller.

example.ex: The vast forests of West Africa have shrunk...
example.tran: 西非的大片森林面积已缩小了。

example.ex: Hungary may have to lower its hopes of shrinking its state sector.
example.tran: 匈牙利可能不得不降低其缩小国家军事管制区的期望。

entry.tran: (因害怕、震惊或厌恶)退缩，畏缩，避开
entry.def: If you shrink away from someone or something, you move away from them because you are frightened, shocked, or disgusted by them.

example.ex: One child shrinks away from me when I try to talk to him...
example.tran: 当我试图和一个孩子说话时，他避开了我。

example.ex: Siegfried cringed and shrank against the wall...
example.tran: 西格弗里德畏缩了，退避到墙根。

entry.def: If you do not shrink from a task or duty, you do it even though it is unpleasant or dangerous.

example.ex: We must not shrink from the legitimate use of force if we are to remain credible...
example.tran: 我们要想保持诚信可靠，就绝不能避忌武力的合法使用。
他们在危险面前没有退缩。
我已经看过心理专家了。

means.word_mean: 1. process or result of becoming less or smaller;

sentences.sentence: "the material lost 2 inches per yard in shrinkage"

auth_sentence.content: Forget shrinking nest eggs or threats to Social Security.
auth_sentence.res_content: Forget shrinking nest eggs or threats to Social Security.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Forget shrinking nest eggs or threats to Social Security.

auth_sentence.content: Today, Russia's population is aging and shrinking.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today, Russia's population is aging and shrinking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Today, Russia's population is aging and shrinking.

auth_sentence.content: No shrinking member of the genus Viola was he.
auth_sentence.res_content: No shrinking member of the genus Viola was he.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No shrinking member of the genus Viola was he.

Sentence.sentence: But at a time when the American factory seems to be a shrinking presence, and when good manufacturing jobs have vanished, perhaps never to return, there is something deeply troubling about this dilution of American craftsmanship.

Manufacturing's shrinking presence undoubtedly helps explain the decline in craftsmanship, if only because many of the nation's assembly line workers were skilled in craft work, if not on the job then in their spare time
They have stagnant (萧条的) or shrinking markets for goods and services.
